name: Chocolate Frosty®
description: Enjoy a small Frosty for FREE when you add a Spicy Chicken Sandwich Combo to your cart and use code HOUSEWENDYS at checkout. Applicable on Sundays only, now through 5/19.

name: Parmesan Caesar Salad
description: Made fresh daily with romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, grape tomatoes, Italian cheeses, crunchy Parmesan crisps, and creamy Caesar dressing. One bite will tell you why it's king of more than just the Romaines.

name: Vanilla Frosty®
description: Enjoy a small Frosty for FREE when you add a Spicy Chicken Sandwich Combo to your cart and use code HOUSEWENDYS at checkout. Applicable on Sundays only, now through 5/19.

name: S'Awesome Bacon Cheeseburger Combo
description: A quarter-pound* of fresh, never frozen beef, three strips of Applewood-smoked bacon, melted American cheese, crisp lettuce, onion, and pickle, all covered in our signature sweet, smoky, tangy sauce. A masterpiece signed with S'Awesome.

name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich Combo
description: Add a Spicy Chicken Sandwich Combo to your cart and get a small Frosty for FREE when you enter code HOUSEWENDYS at checkout. Applicable on Sundays only, now through 5/19.

name: North Pacific Cod Combo
description: Wild caught North Pacific cod filet, crunchy panko breading topped with creamy dill tartar sauce, three dill pickle slices, and lettuce. There may be plenty of fish in the sea, but this is by far the most delicious.

name: $5 Bacon Double Stack™ Biggie Bag
description: Two fresh, never-frozen beef patties, Applewood smoked bacon, cheese, ketchup, mustard, pickle and onion. Bacon makes even the Double Stack better. But it's best in a Biggie Bag along with 4 pc nuggets, small fry and small drink.

name: Baconator® Combo
description: A half-pound* of fresh, never frozen beef, American cheese, 6 pieces of crispy Applewood smoked bacon, ketchup, and mayo. Carnivores rejoice!

name: Dave's Combo
description: A quarter-pound of fresh, never frozen beef, American cheese, crisp lettuce, tomato, pickle, ketchup, mayo, mustard, and onion on a toasted bun, just the way Dave intended.

name: 10 PC. Chicken Nuggets Combo
description: 100% white-meat chicken breaded to crispy perfection and served with your choice of 6 dipping sauces including Buttermilk Ranch, Creamy Sriracha, BBQ, Sweet & Sour, Honey Mustard, or Side of S'Awesome. They're trending in our restaurants and Twitter feed alike.

name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
description: A juicy chicken breast marinated and breaded in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices to deliver more flavor inside and out, cooled down with crisp lettuce, tomato, and mayo. It's the original spicy chicken sandwich, and the one you crave.

description: Juicy white meat, lightly breaded and seasoned, topped with Applewood smoked bacon, crisp lettuce, tomato, cheese, and mayo. A classic taste, perfectly reinvented.

name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
description: Juicy white meat, lightly breaded and seasoned, topped with crisp lettuce, and mayo. More than delicious, and just the right size.

name: Grilled Chicken Wrap
description: Herb-marinated grilled chicken breast wrapped in a flour tortilla with crisp spring mix, shredded cheddar cheese, and smoky honey mustard. It's a handful of flavor.

name: Spicy Chicken Wrap
description: Juicy chicken breast marinated and breaded in our unique, fiery blend of peppers and spices to deliver more flavor inside and out, wrapped in a tortilla with crisp lettuce, shredded cheddar cheese, and ranch sauce. It's a whole handful of hot.

name: Parmesan Caesar Salad
description: Made fresh daily with romaine lettuce, grilled chicken breast, grape tomatoes, Italian cheeses, crunchy Parmesan crisps, and creamy Caesar dressing. One bite will tell you why it's king of more than just the Romaines.

name: Harvest Chicken Salad
description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, diced red and green apples, dried cranberries, feta cheese, brown sugar walnuts, Applewood smoked bacon, and grilled chicken breast hot off the grill, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Apple Cider Vinaigrette. It's one bountiful Harvest.

name: Southwest Avocado Chicken Salad
description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, pepper jack cheese, diced tomatoes, cool, creamy avocado, Applewood smoked bacon, and grilled chicken breast hot off the grill, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Southwest Ranch Dressing. It's zesty and Southwesty!.

name: Taco Salad
description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, shredded cheddar cheese, diced tomatoes, salsa, sour cream, tortilla chips, and our famous, hearty chili. A fresh twist on Taco Tuesday (or any other day for that matter).

name: Apple Pecan Chicken Salad
description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, crisp red and green apples, dried cranberries, roasted pecans, crumbled blue cheese, and grilled chicken breast hot off the grill, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Pomegranate Vinaigrette. An unbeatable pick.

name: Caesar Side Salad
description: Made fresh daily with hand-chopped romaine lettuce, grape tomatoes, a three cheese blend of Parmesan, Asiago, and croutons, all topped with a creamy Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Caesar dressing. Just the right size to satisfy.

name: Garden Side Salad
description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, and croutons, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Ranch dressing. It's the salad that goes with anything.

name: French Fries
description: Natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries served hot and crispy. The world loves them for a reason.

name: Baconator® Fries
description: Our natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries topped with warm, creamy cheese sauce, shredded cheddar, and crispy Applewood smoked bacon. The only fries worthy of the Baconator name.

name: Chili Cheese Fries
description: Our natural-cut, skin-on, sea-salted fries topped with our hearty chili and rich, creamy cheese sauce. Easy to love. Hard to beat.

name: Chili
description: The only hearty chili made with our fresh, never frozen beef. Perfectly seasoned and positively irresistible. Red's kind of our thing, you know.

name: Plain Baked Potato
description: The satisfying simplicity of good, honest, hot, fluffy baked potato perfection. Ingredients: Potato.

name: Sour Cream and Chive Baked Potato
description: A hot, fluffy potato topped with the classic combination of chives, sour cream, and butter. It's a side, it's a meal, it's a potato's potato. Potato.

name: Bacon Cheese Baked Potato
description: Hot and fluffy potato topped with rich, creamy cheese sauce and crisp Applewood smoked bacon. Because nothing goes with a potato like cheese and bacon.

name: Chili & Cheese Baked Potato
description: Hot and fully potato topped with Wendy's signature meaty, flavorful chili, rich, creamy cheese sauce, and shredded cheddar. This spud's your best bud.

name: Cheese Baked Potato
description: Hot and fully potato with shredded cheddar cheese and rich, creamy cheese sauce on top. It's savory and delicious no matter how you skin it.

name: Caesar Side Salad
description: Made fresh daily with hand-chopped romaine lettuce, grape tomatoes, a three cheese blend of Parmesan, Asiago, and croutons, all topped with a creamy Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Caesar dressing. Just the right size to satisfy.

description: Made fresh daily with Wendy's signature lettuce blend, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, and croutons, all topped with Marzetti® Simply Dressed® Ranch dressing. It's the salad that goes with anything.
